thread.title: 17 Signs You're the Petty One in the Relationship
thread.title_full: 17 Signs You're the Petty One in the Relationship

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: 17 Signs You're the Petty One in the Relationship
text:
1. You will absolutely bring up that one time they forgot an anniversary.
Him: im not about to argue with you don't even start I'm not in the mood. Me: pic.twitter.com/tmNlBdWY3u
‚Äî Aryah. (@HellishBae) February 2, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 2. You have started many a passive aggressive not-texting war.
when y'all ignoring each other and waiting for a text back but y'all both too petty to text first pic.twitter.com/XDwp92lXyO
‚Äî Typical Girl (@SoDamnTrue) June 21, 2016 3. Because you'd rather just make them figure out what they did wrong.
lolüò≠ @heennddrixx #pettygf üëÄ
A post shared by SHONTELLE TUSA‚úå (@its_shontelle) on Nov 23, 2016 at 7:25pm PST
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 4. You will call them out at every moment they don't pay attention to you.
When ur boyfriend pisses you off and ignores you so you're petty AF pic.twitter.com/FkbAcsN7X3
‚Äî „Ö§ (@sashstuart) February 11, 2017 5. You keep tabs on how long it takes them to text back so you can take longer .
üòÇüòÇüòÇüòÇ
A post shared by WotUSayinTho¬Æ ‚ùì‚ìÇÔ∏è (@wot_u_sayin_tho) on Feb 13, 2017 at 4:29am PST
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 6. You will 100 percent call them out if they text while they're with you.
B TTTCCHHH. I will leave your ass. üòê Fuck yu need a phone for if I'm right here #pettytime #pettypost #petty #childish #pettygf
A post shared by Corona MFKIN Harris (@coronaa_bruh) on Nov 2, 2016 at 5:43am PDT
7. Actually, when do you not call them out?
#petty #savage #dead #flatlined #noharmdone #nochill #crazy #internetshit #pettychallenge #pettyaf #pettyboyfriend
A post shared by Lillian Mwenda (@lillianmwenda) on Aug 14, 2016 at 2:24pm PDT
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 8. You've definitely pulled the ol' "intensely glance at their texts and then ask them who they're texting" move.
#texas #htown #2017 #happy #bye #hilarious #funny #truth #tx #teamnatural #naturalhair #smh #amen #jesus #jesuschrist #teamsingle #teampretty #prettygirl #petty #pretty #prettygirls #houston #vision #love #loveyourself #lovinlife #motivation #motivated #spoiled
A post shared by Miss Jackson if u nasty! (@pebblewalk33) on Feb 13, 2017 at 11:46am PST
9. You're always doing the little things to remind them that they are nothing without you.
buying bae this pic.twitter.com/6mX0zKWRnM
‚Äî Female Problems (@Iifepost) September 22, 2016 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 10. Forgetting to text you back has some pretty harsh consequences.
https://hchocolate.tumblr.com/post/156841971452 11. You know the power of tweeting while ignoring their texts.
@i_am_the_sassy_one always boo üòÇüòÇ follow my girl @i_am_the_sassy_one @i_am_the_sassy_one #crazybitchprobs
A post shared by Funny Memes Quote: s And Vids (@crazybitchprobs) on Feb 12, 2017 at 5:30pm PST
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 12. As well as getting really creative with calling out your partner's bullshit.
My boyfriend is literally THE most PETTY person in the universe pic.twitter.com/clCxYAV1r0
‚Äî darian takase (@DarianTakase) January 17, 2017 13. You're no stranger to temporary breakups that happen at least once a week.
This is how petty my boyfriend is... üòÇüòÇüòÇüòÇ pic.twitter.com/5ByxENSWYg
‚Äî ‚Ñ≥‚ÑÇ∆ò‚àän∆∂…®‚àä ∆òels‚àä∆¥ (@mb_kelsey) February 3, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 14. In fact, you act like you've just broken up half the time, just to teach them a lesson.
I've started changing the Netflix password whenever my boyfriend pisses me off bc petty
‚Äî Brittany West (@BrittanyyWest) February 13, 2017 15. But for now, you're just glad you date someone who embraces your petty nature.
Couples who throw shade together stay together pic.twitter.com/9bDsfeEhN2
‚Äî „Ö§ (@iFeelYouTune) March 25, 2016 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 16. And, if anything, loves you for it.
http://arandomthot.tumblr.com/post/155140621366/those-who-are-petty-together-stay-together 17. Because after all: Two can play that game.
http://bmoneyuniverse.tumblr.com/post/154538895825 Follow Julia on Twitter .
